text: لِّيُعَذِّبَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلْمُنَـٰفِقِينَ وَٱلْمُنَـٰفِقَـٰتِ وَٱلْمُشْرِكِينَ وَٱلْمُشْرِكَـٰتِ وَيَتُوبَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَى ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَٱلْمُؤْمِنَـٰتِ ۗ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ غَفُورًا رَّحِيمًۢا

translation.en.sahih: [It was] so that Allah may punish the hypocrite men and hypocrite women and the men and women who associate others with Him and that Allah may accept repentance from the believing men and believing women. And ever is Allah Forgiving and Merciful.
translation.id.indonesian: sehingga Allah mengazab orang-orang munafik laki-laki dan perempuan dan orang-orang musyrikin laki-laki dan perempuan; dan sehingga Allah menerima taubat orang-orang mukmin laki-laki dan perempuan. Dan adalah Allah Maha Pengampun lagi Maha Penyayang.
